content.question:
In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable.

Respond to parts a, b, and c.

Briefly describe one context that shaped the growth of slavery in the British North American colonies from 1607 to 1754.

Briefly explain how participation in slavery was similar in the Chesapeake region and in colonies north of the Chesapeake region from 1607 to 1754.

Briefly explain how participation in slavery was different in the Chesapeake region and in colonies north of the Chesapeake region from 1607 to 1754.
